titles.title: A concurrent resolution honoring the 100th anniversary of the historic congressional charter of the National Society of the Sons of the American Revolution.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 4/24/2006--Introduced. Recognizes the 100th anniversary of the historic congressional charter of the National Society of the Sons of the American Revolution (SAR). Honors SAR for its work to perpetuate and honor the memory of the individuals who fought to gain our freedom during the War for Independence, and for their devotion to our nation's youth.
